column4: hello.  Do you know something about kernel bugs at version 2.6.10-5?
no, the last problems were in 2.6.10-4 (build 26) that I'm aware of
I see tritium.... is just that after today's upgrades, I don't have acpi support
kernel's log shows successful acpi loading
hmm, that's the first I've heard of any problems with it.  Sorry.
OK.  Thx tritium.  I will try to find out what happened.  Its a pitty, since mine is a laptop...
yes, I'm sorry that happened to you
r u a kernel developer tritium?
I had never meet a kernel mantainer... they are mytic hah
I just like to see people have a good ubuntu experience, that's all
that's so kind tritium! A real FLOSS attitude. congrats.
but now it's bed time.  Take care!  See you around...
